Pre-Game Insights: Mayank Yadav is expected to make his India debut in the T20 series against Bangladesh
The absence of India's T20 regulars will provide an opportunity for fringe players like Harshit Rana, Nitish Kumar, Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson, Riyan Parag, and Jitesh Sharma
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series will mark the return of mystery spinner Varun Chakaravarthy
The three games will serve as an audition for the four T20s in South Africa next month
Bangladesh start life without Shakib Al Hasan
Others: The series will be played in Gwalior
International cricket returns to Gwalior after 14 years
The series will be a test of Mayank Yadav's fitness and temperament
The series will also provide the IPL franchises more clarity on the Indian players they want to retain ahead of the mega auction
